response.original_title: A Mão Que Toca o Braço
response.overview: How did the formal conventions of classical Hollywood cinema help reinforce gender roles? By examining interactions between men and women in American films produced between 1930 and the early 1960s, A mão que toca o braço denaturalizes gestures that often go unnoticed. In doing so, the film reveals a disturbing omnipresence of touch.
response.title: A Mão Que Toca o Braço
